QAPair.Question: What is (are) Norovirus - hospital ?
QAPair.Answer: Norovirus is a virus (germ) that causes an infection of the stomach and intestines. Norovirus can spread easily in health care settings. Read on to learn how to prevent getting infected with norovirus if you're in the hospital.
